## Bio

Zahíð Asghar is Professor at School of Economics, with special interests in  applied economics, econometric, applied statistics, data analysis, trainings and data visualization. He is 
living in Islamabad, Pakistan. His research both in applied economics and applied statistics appeared in leading national and international journals.He has been conducting trainings on making sense of data and strong communicator of critical thinking with data and overcoming cognitive biases while doing policy analysis.He propagates new education accounting system in higher education system as per needs of the fourth industrial revolution.
